name: Pookeeman Mega Red
description:
Do you want to be the very best there ever was? 

Well join Ashton Ketchup as he joins the Pookeeman trial after being convinced by his sidekick Foggy! Catch Pookeeman! Train them up! Battle other trainers! 

Foggy and Ashton are very excited to meet the famous Demonstrators, especially their leader Dayna, but when they meet her it becomes clear something is slightly off about her. Is she truly the great trainer ever says she is or is she hiding something?

Join them for unique trials lead by each of the Demonstrators. Each trial one person will be kicked off but the winner will leave victorious as a new member of the Demonstrators. Vote off Demonstrators who you hate and battle for the ultimate title of the champion!

(Currently only trial 1 is in the demo)

Don't forget to leave a review and some feedback!

Happy game playing :)
